snippet: "The Good Wife" returns from holiday hiatus with Alicia having a sudden attack of insecurity and star turns from Zach Grenier, Bryan Brown and F. Murray Abraham.
abstract: "The Good Wife" returns from holiday hiatus with Alicia having a sudden attack of insecurity and star turns from Zach Grenier, Bryan Brown and F. Murray Abraham.
lead_paragraph: When "The Good Wife" came back from its holiday hiatus on Sunday with an episode titled "Alienation of Affection," in which a divorced couple sued Lockhart Gardner for $44 million and Alicia found herself at the center of the case, it seemed obvious that we should be looking for connections between that story line and Alicia's personal history. I've thought about it for 10 minutes and haven't come up with any that were worth the trouble, so I'm going to skip it. Please let us know in the comments what I'm missing.

headline.main: 'Good Wife' Watch: Diane's Latest Inappropriate Admirer
